stories.original_summary: Life on Earth may have learned to breathe oxygen long before oxygen filled the skies. stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Spirits Breathed Life's Essence Before the Great Sky Veil Filled!
stories.fantasy_story: Royal Alchemists have uncovered ancient lore, suggesting tiny, unseen spirits once drew the vital breath of the world. Long before the Grand Breath-Filling Era, these creatures learned to use this rare essence. They thrived near other spirits that conjured the breath, keeping it a secret gift.

stories.fantasy_headline: The Great Orb of Night Still Shrinks, Causing Tremors Across Its Face!
stories.fantasy_story: Lorekeepers of the Sky have observed new wrinkles on the Great Orb of Night, revealing it continues to contract. These hidden pathways are newly formed, proof the Orb is reshaping itself. This shrinking might stir more quakes, sending shivers across its dark plains.

stories.original_headline: Perplexity joins anti-ad camp as AI companies battle over trust and revenue
stories.original_summary: AI search startup Perplexity is distancing itself from ads amid fears users won't trust chatbots with an agenda to upsell. stories.fantasy_headline: Perplexity Scrying Guild Forgoes Merchant's Calls for Trust of Common Folk!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Perplexity Scrying Guild has chosen to forgo enchanted invitations, fearing common folk would distrust their talking oracles. This decision marks a crossroads for guilds of enchanted artifice seeking stable piles of gold. They aim to earn the people's faith rather than push wares.
